SourceString: A mysterious stone monument is floating in front of you.\nWhen {Character_Name} approached the stone monument,\nthe Zoomstone began to glow.<br_break>
Apparently, if you pray at this location,\nyou can have the Zoomstone remember it as\na destination.<br_break>
Do you want Zoomstone to remember\n{Place_Name}?<yesno><break>
Looks like this location is already\nmemorized in the Zoomstone.<end>
{Character_Name} has stopped from being memorized by Zoomstone.<end>
But it was drowned out by a mysterious power!<end>
Please choose where to add the selected item.<break>
This location has already been added to favorites.<end>
The slot already has registered locations. Is it okay to\noverwrite?<yesno><break>
No locations have been added to that slot yet.<end>
Please select the slot whose position you want to change.<break>
Use the Zoomstone to Zoom to\n{Location_Name}?<yesno><break>
{Character_Name} hit their head on the ceiling.<end>
You cannot travel to a different era!
I think I'm going to hit my head here.
